Title: (송년 특별) 베토벤 9번 교향곡'합창' 클라우스 메켈레, 파리 오케스트라.
Description:
이번 영상은 리뷰가 아닌 연주 실황 녹음을 가져왔습니다.
한 해의 끝을 맞이하는 송년에는 역시 베토벤의 합창인 것 같습니다.
모두 이 위대한 음악을 들으며 다사다난했던 한 해를 마무리하시길 바랍니다.
02:45 - 18:38,  1악장 Allegro ma non troppo, un poco maestoso
18:39 - 32:42,  2악장 Molto vivace - Presto
32:43 - 47:08,  3악장 Adagio molto e cantabile - Andante moderato
47:09  -             4악장 환희의 송가(Ode an die Freude) Presto - Allegro assai
지휘: 클라우스 메켈레 Klaus Mäkelä
연주: 파리 오케스트라 Orchestre de Paris

Title: Brahms: Symphony No. 4 in E minor, Op. 98. Director: Klaus Mäkelä. Oslo Philharmonic
Description:
The Symphony No. 4 in E minor, Op. 98 by Johannes Brahms is the last of his symphonies. Brahms began working on the piece in Mürzzuschlag, then in the Austro-Hungarian Empire, in 1884, just a year after completing his Symphony No. 3. Brahms conducted the Court Orchestra in Meiningen, Germany, for the work's premiere on 25 October 1885

Follow us @Musicalmasterpieceschannel

Klaus Mäkelä  Antonín Dvořák  Symphony No  9 ‘From the New World’  Made in America
Description:
Dvořák – Symphony No. 9 “From the New World” | Klaus Mäkelä – Made in America

Immerse yourself in Antonín Dvořák’s most beloved masterpiece, the Symphony No. 9 in E minor, Op. 95, also known as “From the New World”. In this thrilling performance, Klaus Mäkelä brings a fresh, youthful energy to a work deeply rooted in American spirit and Czech nostalgia.

🇺🇸 Written during Dvořák’s stay in the United States (1893), this symphony blends:

Native American and African American musical influences

Lush Bohemian melodies

Movements & Timestamps – Dvořák: Symphony No. 9 “From the New World”

00:10 – I. Adagio – Allegro molto
13:06 – II. Largo
26:12 – III. Scherzo: Molto vivace
33:53 – IV. Allegro con fuoco

📌 Ideal for:

Fans of Romantic symphonies

American classical repertoire

Students of orchestral composition

Listeners seeking music that bridges continents and cultures

🛎️ Subscribe for weekly uploads of legendary and rising conductors, full symphonic works, and rare classical gems.


Tags: #Dvořák #SymphonyNo9 #NewWorldSymphony #KlausMäkelä #ClassicalMusic #MadeInAmerica #OrchestralMusic #CulturalHeritage

Title: Wiegenlied (world premiere) / Sauli Zinovjev / Klaus Mäkelä / Oslo Philharmonic
Description:
The Oslo Philharmonic with conductor Klaus Mäkelä perform the world premiere of Wiegenlied by Sauli Zinovjev in Oslo Concert Hall on 19th August 2020.

Video production: Trippel-M Levende Bilder 
Multicamera director: Robin Richardsen
Sound production: LAWO
Music Producer: Vegard Landaas
